alert.note: Alert for Ouachita; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Union and central Ouachita Parishes through 530 PM CDT... At 442 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Claiborne, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Claiborne, West Monroe, Swartz, Brownsville-Bawcom, Brownsville-Bawcomville, Richwood, Sterlington, Downsville, Drew, Fairbanks, Perryville, Calhoun, Loch Lomon, Millhaven, Folksville, Cheniere, Rocky Branch, Pine Grove and Guthrie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
